import React from 'react'; import {Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid, CircularProgress} from '@material-ui/core'; import './CardsStyle.css' const Cards = ({ data: {confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate} }) => { if(!confirmed){ return( ) } return(
Active Cases REAL DATA Number of people infected with COVID19 REAL DATE Recovered Patients REAL DATA Number of people recovered from COVID19 REAL DATE Deaths REAL DATA Number of deaths due to COVID19 REAL DATE
); } export default Cards
